title: ビーナスは片想い 1
description: College: A time for new friends and new loves — and getting confused about which is which. It seems like Suzuna is on track to land Fukami, the guy of her dreams. But when she meets his best friend and her new neighbour, Eichi, Suzuna's forced to take a second look at the whole situation. She's about to discover that love can come with some unexpected competition!
author: Yuki Nakaji
